channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
OK Ive finally gotten the new crowns i want :D
Now how do i put them in use and on a certain person?
So on my self i want the owner one and on my friend i want the co-owner...
Thanks.

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @PvPXile PvPXile
item.description:
@PvPXile wrote:

Okay, add the new sprite into your cache and give yourself the playerrights according to the old sprite, then your done.

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:6, topic:466640”][quote author=Host Gushers link=topic=583450.msg4154407#msg4154407 date=1352601225]

If your Base already has an existing Staff System (which it should), then you should find that. From there it should just be replacement issues.

Where do i find this sht?
[/quote]

Well, searching your Player/Client class for the phrase “rights” might be a good start.

Find out how it assigns Player Rights. Is it saved in their Character File? Perhaps Rights are assigned based upon the Username during the Login Method? That’s a good place for you to start. Nobody is going to hold your hand, but we’re more than willing to help those who can help themselves.[/quote]

i have a 525 rsps…Where do i add new rights? i have mod,admin,owner,donator… i just want to have certain pictures for each.

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Host Gushers, post:5, topic:466640”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=583450.msg4154404#msg4154404 date=1352601138]
If your Base already has an existing Staff System (which it should), then you should find that. From there it should just be replacement issues.
[/quote]

Where do i find this sht?[/quote]

Well, searching your Player/Client class for the phrase “rights” might be a good start.

Find out how it assigns Player Rights. Is it saved in their Character File? Perhaps Rights are assigned based upon the Username during the Login Method? That’s a good place for you to start. Nobody is going to hold your hand, but we’re more than willing to help those who can help themselves.

Read full topic

Do you think u could give me some steps?

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Adding a Condition for your Rights and editing your Public/Private chat systems would be a good start.

Read full topic
